1. Forget about Galaxy S26: Samsung could pull an Apple for the Galaxy S28's GPU  Android Authority
  2. With Galaxy S26, Samsung may have initiated efforts to lean less on Qualcomm Snapdragon chips  PhoneArena
  3. [News] Samsung Reportedly Pushes In-House CPU and GPU for Exynos 2800 to Cut Qualcomm, AMD Reliance  TrendForce
  4. Exynos 2600 puts Samsung back in the 2nm game  Fudzilla.com
  5. Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 vs Exynos 2600: Can Samsung make a comeback in 2026?  livemint.com

item.title: Japan’s Viral Horse-Racing Video Game Has Players Flocking to Real-Life Stables - Bloomberg.com
item.description:
1. Japan’s Viral Horse-Racing Video Game Has Players Flocking to Real-Life Stables  Bloomberg.com
  2. Everyone became a horse girl in 2025 thanks to this massive cultural hit  Polygon
  3. 2026 may be year of the horse, but 2025 certainly gave it a good go with the amount of horse-related games, expansions, and updates we've had  PC Gamer
  4. How I learned to stop worrying and love the anime horse racing game  Eurogamer
  5. The Biggest Sports Anime of the Decade Is Worth All The Hype  Comic Book Resources
